verbs.description: fustianize (third-person singular simple present fustianizes, present participle fustianizing, simple past and past participle fustianized)

entries.meaning: (intransitive, dated) To write or utter pretentious statements.
examples: What is a poet's love? — / To write a girl a sonnet, / To get a ring, or some such thing, / And fustianize upon it.
